label: 金銀相対済令
対訳語: Instruction for the private settlement of money disputes
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: きんぎんあいたいすましれい
見出し読み_mod: きんぎんあいたいすましれい
説明文: [A declaration by the shogunate] in 1719 that disputes over money-lending were private affairs and were to be settled without recourse to the official judicial system (p. 446).
